about.title: About the Celebration of Service Series
about.description: Inclusive Security Collective Initiative (iSCI) LLC hosts the Celebration of Service™ Event Series, bridging defense, industry, and innovation through experiential programming that celebrates leadership, service, and community.
about.mission: Advance inclusive economic pathways, cultural diplomacy, and leadership development across the Defense Industrial Complex and creative sectors — including sports, wellness, and the arts.

schedule.title: VIP Reception
schedule.description: Exclusive networking with honorees and special guests

schedule.title: Main Program & Awards Presentation
schedule.description: Keynote addresses and recognition of distinguished leaders

schedule.title: Closing Networking Reception
schedule.description: Conclude the evening with refreshments and connections
